Others: Zion Williamson returned from a 27-game injury absence and scored 22 points in a 104-97 loss to the Minnesota Timberwolves.
The loss dropped the Pelicans to 7-30 on the season, effectively ending their postseason aspirations.
Williamson's teammate, Brandon Ingram, may depart via trade next month after failing to agree on a contract extension last summer.
Williamson expressed his desire to work hard and enjoy playing basketball amidst trade rumors and the team's poor performance.
